description: Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for the Tic Tac Toe backend application.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller that handles basic API endpoints for the Tic Tac Toe backend, including health checks and documentation redirects.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message for the application.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to Swagger UI for API documentation.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns the health status of the application.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns information about the Spring Boot application.
